edited_stories.edited_story_text: I went to a bazaar today. They had a lot of things for sale.  There were boots, purses, scarves, any many other accessories. I wanted to buy everything.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: The office held a purse marketing event today. A lot of people showed up for the special presentation. There were lots of shoes, purses and other accessories on display. We all looked through the different options that were for sale. The presenter told us all about the products and we listened intently.
